caption.p: Pretreatment HIV drug resistance related transmission networks. Note: a Three sequences were from Liangshan and drug resistance mutations were E138Q and V179D. b Two sequences were from Liangshan and drug resistance mutation was K103N. c Two sequences were from Dehong and drug resistance mutations were K103N and V106M. d Two sequences were from Liuzou and drug resistance mutation was K103N. e Two sequences were from Shandong and drug resistance mutation was L210W. PDR: pretreatment drug resistance; NNRTI: non-nucleoside reverse-transcriptase inhibitor; NRTI: Nucleoside reverse-transcriptase inhibitor; PI: Protease inhibitor
